LanguageData.MethThought.stages.0.label: high on methamphetamine
LanguageData.MethThought.stages.0.description: I feel so good, I am the best, Let's do this!
LanguageData.MethWithdrawal.stages.1.label: methamphetamine withdrawal
LanguageData.MethWithdrawal.stages.1.description: I'm so ill, I'm sweating and I can't concentrate, everything is mixed up.
